name: Nosepass

passive.name: True North
passive.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a card. Take the top 5 cards of your deck, and add that card. Shuffle your deck and the top 6 cards separately, then put the top 6 cards back on your deck.

flavor: The large nose of the pokemon made the explorer who discovered them feel a lot more confident about her own vile nose.
